articles.title: Microsoft Corporation CEO Discusses Future Strategy
articles.excerpt: In a recent interview, the CEO outlined the company's vision for growth in the coming years, focusing on Xbox.

articles.title: Microsoft Corporation Announces New Office Product
articles.excerpt: The company unveiled its latest innovation in the Windows market, expected to drive future growth.
